page.title: 20TRANSPORT
page.content: THE B4521 ABERGAVENNY TO ROSS ON WYE ROAD PASSES THROUGH THE NORTH WEST CORNER OF THE AREA AND THE B4233 ABERGAVENNY TO MONMOUTH ROAD PASSES WEST TO EAST. OTHER UNCLASIFIED ROADS AND LANES SERVE VILLAGES AND FARMS. A MARKET DAY BUS RUNS ON BOTH THE CLASS B ROADS. A POST BUS OPERATES IN THE AREA MAKING TWO JOURNEYS PER DAY EVERY WEEKDAY FROM ABERGAVENNY, PICKING UP PASSENGERS. CHILDREN ARE TRANSPORTED TO SCHOOL IN TAXIS, MINI BUSES AND BUSES. MOST FAMILIES OWN ONE OR TWO CARS. BICYCLES AND MOTORBIKES ARE USED PARTICULARLY BY YOUNG PEOPLE.
